text: Martí Batres Guadarrama (born 26 January 1967) is a Mexican politician who was the head of government of Mexico City from 2023 until 2024. He took office after the resignation of Claudia Sheinbaum in June 2023. He is also the former President of the National Regeneration Movement (MORENA). ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Heads of Government of Mexico City
title: Martí Batres
